features: BRILLIANT AND CONTROLLABLE RGB LIGHTING: The gaming microphone has 12 personalized RGB lighting modes which can be selected with a press of a button. The soft and coordinated light effects will make your video gaming or live streaming more eye-catching and fascinating. You can also choose to turn off the lighting effect!
USB TYPE C PLUG AND PLAY: This mic with a noise reduction USB-A cable and USB-C cable is compatible with computer, PC, laptops (windows&MAC), PS4, Android Phone etc. No extra driver is required.

EASY-TO-REACH CONTROLS - The gain knob enables quickly adjustment if there is any sensitivity, lack of sound or distortion during live broadcasting. Or if you want to take a break in the middle of a podcast, lightly press the gain knob,One-press mute. And there is a 3.5mm headphone jack on the back of this USB streaming mic for real-time monitoring.

EXCELLENT SOUND QUALITY: This podcast microphone has a cardioid pickup pattern, allowing it to capture the clear, smooth, crisp sound and suppress unwanted background noise. Supports sample rates up to 192kHz/24bit, Great for presentations, Zoom, podcasts, Recordings, Skype, YouTube, instant messaging, gaming, and streaming on Twitch.

EASY INSTALLATION AND VERSATILITY: Without any assembly, you can use this computer microphone by simply plugging in a USB Type-C cable. You can install the mic on a standard boom arm just by remove desk stand. Note: If you need to connect an iPhone, an extra adapter is required（not include).

productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 1,101 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Performance USB Microphone with RGB Light
reviews.reviewText: contentI am delighted to share my positive experience with this innovative device and highly recommend it to anyone in search of a USB microphone that combines functionality with eye-catching aesthetics.What I really like is the RGB lighting function,The gaming microphone has 12 personalized RGB lighting modes which can be selected with a press of a button.The addition of RGB lighting takes this USB microphone to the next level. The captivating lights not only add a visually stunning element to my setup but also create a unique ambiance. With a variety of customizable lighting options and effects, I can match the microphone's RGB lighting with my existing gaming or workspace aesthetic. It adds a personal touch and sets the stage for an immersive and engaging experience.Besides, it is stylish.The design of this USB microphone is sleek and modern, adding a touch of elegance to my setup. It not only performs exceptionally but also enhances the visual appeal of my workspace with its stylish presence.Most importantly, it is value for money.Considering its exceptional performance and features, this USB microphone provides excellent value for money. It offers professional-grade audio quality at a reasonable price, making it a smart investment for anyone in need of a reliable and high-performing microphone.I couldn't be happier with my purchase. It has quickly become an essential tool in my audio setup.If you're in search of a high-quality USB microphone that delivers exceptional results, I wholeheartedly recommend considering this remarkable device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to use great for kids to start their podcasts
reviews.reviewText: This was easy to use my 13-year-old used it for homework and she sounded so good. It eliminates outside sounds so it is a great product to start with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gift for a first speaker
reviews.reviewText: I love this speaker I got it for my mom as a gift and she loves it. The price was reasonable as well, it works great and the sound is very clear. The speaker was boxed nicely and nothing came broken, it was well protected in this box. The pictures show how nice the speaker is but in person the speaker is so nice. Very happy with this purchase will be buying myself one and other friends and family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The microphone does as it's advertised, I would recommend to people though to pay attention to their phones because not everyone's phone including mine has the OTP feature that would make it so that you can use it also on your phone all the while recording; it's primarily for computers like laptops etc. I like the nifty features it has and it's quality mirrors it's price so no complaints. It's quite good especially considering the price. I listen to the difference in quality myself with and without it and the former definitely improves quality by at least 25%.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for gaming!
reviews.reviewText: I got this to replace my headset with and it works great, love the ease of muting or changing the volume.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my son's gaming computer and set up was simple, the less match his computer tower and he loves being able to talk online and record videos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Has a harshness to it
reviews.reviewText: Bought for our son wanting to start his own gaming/ youtube channel. It's a great mic but very sensitive to the closeness/ far away. If he speaks to close it's crunchy and way too loud, if he moves a tad further away it's very quiet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s a great mic just be sure to turn your volume down about because the default I a bit loud

reviews.reviewTitle: NITIDEZ DE SONIDO Y CALIDAD DEL MICROFONO
reviews.reviewText: Me encanto este microfono , ideal para emisiones en vivo para Youtube , Twich, y llamadas por video o plataformas como GOOGLE MEET Y / O ZOOM.Tiene mucha claridad de sonido y muy buena nitidez al hablar . Lo que me gusto mas es que por el precio, tiene otras prestaciones de micròfonos mas caros: como luz led y mute de un solo clickLO RECOMIENDO. CALIFICACIÒN : 9.0

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The sound has suddenly stopped working, microphone has only been in use since early January as it was a Christmas present, but time window to return has expired because it was purchased in late November. Really sucks and a complete waste of money.
Cumple con lo que promete y tiene un regulador de sonido así como forma de configurar las luces o inclusive apagarlas

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Only used a couple of times and it caught fire so dangerous
